title: What The Board Needs To Know
description: Everything from the week beginning June 12th, 2023 that a corporate board director needs to know ahead of a board meeting. This week we look at stress on audit committees from additional oversight responsibility from areas including cybersecurity and the questions boards need to ask to reduce the burden. Also, a supply-chain attack leads to employee data being stolen, the traits of an ideal cyber-expert board director, the triggers for companies buying cyber insurance last year and four areas of cyber risk boards need to review.
